content: the stars align in this dreamy crochet blanket that couldn t be easier to make color radiates effortlessly like the brightest star thanks to caron colorama halo perfect phasing stitched in the round using double_crochet the star shape is created with simple increases and decreases it s a fun customizable project just choose your favorite shade to achieve a similar effect it s a perfect blanket to spark imagination in any kid s room materials caron® colorama halo perfect phasing™ 17 6 oz/500 g 1059 yds/968 m lavender punch 94023 2 balls or 1821 yds/1665 m
